title: Bronze rank is a fucking joke
body:
Honestly, the scum of the earth you find down there makes you want to uninstall the game. It is even getting me to the point I don't want to go back to ranked, but just what the players say, but how they purposely would rather let you die than help sometimes. Having someone to blame does not take away the fact you just lost the same game they did.

Last game Yas dies 2 minutes in, yells I'm done and DC's for 15 minutes, I say we probably can't win in 4v5 and get shit from Amumu for the rest of the game, like non-stop shit talking.

Game before that I get grief from 3 of my team for dying when I push a lane, than get blamed when they push a lane and die and cop 20 minutes of shit talk from them. Yes, they died on their own and blamed me, I wasn't in the same lane, I wasn't even anywhere near them, I went B just after our team fight and it was my fault they kept pushing and died.

Game before that I go jungle, ping to attack a lane, as I am already in the lane behind the enemy my TF uses his blue card against a minion, than proceeds to run away while I die, rest of the game he avoids me every time I try to help him and gives me shit for it.

Before that all I see is shit talk from the enemy team in /ALL, non stop for the whole game asking us to report each other. Especially straight after I killed Yi AND Leona on my own they asked to report them.

Before that I have my team giving shit to our bot lane who fed like mad. Going 3/25 combined and rather than offer assistance or, you know, go down there to try and help, mid and top just complained, a lot.

It's just one shit talker after the next, someone makes one bad mistake, one wrong play, dies for ANY reason and BAMN, the rest of the team just jump on them like an all you can eat buffet, and you wonder why sometimes players just can't be fucked trying to win. It's not just the shit talking, but the players who want someone else to blame will purposely go out of their way to try and make sure they avoid helping.

Jungler ganks, no kill was taken "GG shit top, not helping you"
Bot lane dies in a 2v4 situation "GG shit bot lane, can't even defend"
Top laner dies "Shit jungler, can't even gank"

It is the never ending story, all players just play the blame game when they lose and do the whole "look at me" when they play well. Skill has nothing to do with getting out of bronze, it's the attitude of the players that put them there and keep them there. You need to be real lucky to have a good run of at least some games so you can climb out or just get stuck with the shit mentality, shit players who are only looking out for themselves and general blaming of others for losing.

replies.body: Once you get out of Bronze don't worry, you'll still be experiencing this. Just learn to ignore people and focus on yourself.
The money question is, does it ever stop?

> [{quoted}](name=Gintamino Bay,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QWGEduOz,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-01-26T09:58:18.875+0000)
>
> The money question is, does it ever stop?

Nope.
I think it does to an extent. But not entirely .

> [{quoted}](name=Gintamino Bay,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QWGEduOz,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-01-26T09:58:18.875+0000)
>
> The money question is, does it ever stop?

No.

So, unless you play with friends, there is no real point to ranked other than to mute everyone and try enjoy yourself regardless if you win or lose? Eventually you may make it to a higher level and get slightly more enjoyable games, but that's about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Gintamino Bay,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=QWGEduOz,comment-id=0004000000010000,timestamp=2016-01-27T09:18:37.183+0000)
>
> So, unless you play with friends, there is no real point to ranked other than to mute everyone and try enjoy yourself regardless if you win or lose? Eventually you may make it to a higher level and get slightly more enjoyable games, but that's about it.

The point of Ranked is to challenge yourself and see how good you are compared to other players. If you need to mute everyone in order to play your best then by all means go ahead. The thing to remember is that the game is designed for fun, and if you're not having fun, there's no point in playing.

2 games tonight. one intentional feeder who trolled all game, and another with a jungler who I am going to take to bondi skin clinic for a checkup because I think he could in fact be a walking talking cancer.

The bronze feels are real. Had a bunch of games in S2 pre-S6 and I was thinking that the punishment system must be working but nope, back in B2 and the filth is real.
try to not focus on what they do wrong mate just think how you could do better and mute ragers and try to carry

When it comes to playing with bronze people, remember this golden rule:

"Never trust your teammates, as you will get disappointed"

So keep farming.
If you are jungler, ping a lot before ganking letting your laner know you will gank.
Keep warding.
and /mute all
and play carry champions.

I got out of bronze after placement with no issue at all last week.

just mute all and play your own game.

also play broken champs to climb out. once you're mid silver just focus on the champ you want to main and master them. worked for me at least. now i just play karthus jg, jayce and tf no worries.

It's not the shit talking that really worries me, it's that Player A goes "You're shit and blah blah blah", than proceeds to never help that person he is shit talking to, even in a team fight I see players purposely not help just to see someone on their team die.
it is incredibly frustrating. and the blame! Oh, the blame!
I recently out of bronze again and I am happy, but I feel ya Bro I feel Ya{{item:3070}}
i feel ya, i had 5 afks in my games in a row,3 of them were intentional.Also i thought silver was bad, i was wrong.
I would kill for silver right now. My game just finished I went something like 6/2 as Nasus against a 0/8 Darius, mid lane DC half the game going 0/9, bot lane sucked just as hard, we lost.
